workflow.name: Birthday and ephemeris notification (Google Contact, Telegram & Home Assistant)
workflow.description:
How it works:
- **Schedule Trigger** on a daily basis (configured at 7.30 am)
- **Connects Google Contacts** to get personal information from them
- **Field Checker** on birthday date & firstnames. And see if there is any celebration for today
- **Send a Telegram Notification** and display the message on a Google Home Speaker via Home Assistant if any celebration has matched

Set up steps:
- **Download** the workflow and **import** it into your n8n instance
- **Configure accounts** for Google Contacts, Telegram and Home Assistant
- And you will be good to go

workflow.name: Birthday and Ephemeris Notification (Google Contact, Telegram & Home Assistant)

parameters.content:
## Scheduling & Offset
If you need to put some time interval between now and the time of trigger

## Call Nominis API
API to get information from the Saint of the day
[More Info](https://nominis.cef.fr/contenus/integrations.html)

## Birthday & First name Operations
Manipulation fo find first name & birthday dates and see if there are some matches

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
